title: League of Legends
description: Multiplayer online battle arena developed and published by Riot Games.

title: Valorant
description: Free-to-play first-person tactical hero shooter developed and published by Riot Games.

title: XDefiant
description: Free-to-play first-person shooter game developed by Ubisoft San Francisco and published by Ubisoft.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
description: First-person shooter game developed by Sledgehammer Games and published by Activision.

title: Elden Ring
description: Action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware.

title: The Finals
description: Free-to-play first-person shooter, developed and published by Nexon subsidiary Embark Studios.

title: The First Descendant
description: Third-person looter shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5.

title: Apex Legends
description: Free-to-play battle royale-hero shooter game developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by Electronic Arts.
